attributes.additional_details:
We wish to ask the goverment to please place CCTV in childrens play areas and school playgrounds around the country, We as the people of england do not wish or care about petty crimes that bring you money i.e shop lifters, parking tickets etc, We wish that you focus more on the saftey of young members of British comunity's that unfortunatly do not bring you money.

We want every childrens play area to have a cctv camera placed by 2016, to catch real criminals who are raping, murdering are people of tomorrow. We also call for a higher penalty if conviceted of such crimes.
